title: Invisibility cloak might soon be reality
text:
Invisibility cloak might soon be reality Technology renders small 3-D object invisible Published On: Sep 21 2015 04:02:06 PM EDT Tweet Scholastic image 
Harry Potter and friends used one to great effect, but is a real-life invisibility cloak possible in real life? New research says it could be. 
Scientists said last week that they've tested such a cloak, made up of microscopic rectangular gold blocks that would conform to an object and render it invisible with visible light, according to a Reuters report. 
The test was done on a miniscule 3-D object, but the scientists said they believe the technology could work for larger objects, including possible military applications, the Reuters report said. Quick Clicks
